name: Space Junk Patrol
description:
Space is Crowded! Space is messy! Space is dangerous!

As a member of the galactic space lane crew, it's your job to keep those lanes clear. This is no easy task, but with the help of your work-issued Mark-IV Astro Smasher Space Lane Maintenance Vehicle, you've got it covered.

This is an arcade-style, room-scale VR game where the player stands in the middle and guides a small spaceship around with the controllers to blast away space junk, repair failing satellites, and shoot down invading ships.

An HTC Vive VR Headset is required to play!
